inn1.comm: not much swing but he gets good bounce from back of length, Rahane dabs it towards point
gets a little bit of shape, 133 kph, Rahane is happy to stay back as he defends it towards off
closer to the stumps now, Rahane comes solidly behind the line and defends it down the pitch
keeps it tight just around off stump, Rahane stays in the crease and defends it to the off side
gets some gentle outswing, but this is wide enough for the batsman to leave alone with ease
gets up on his toes and defends the back of length delivery to the off side. A maiden on his return for Anderson
he moves forward with intent and defends the length delivery solidly to cover. No movement for Woakes there
this one rises up on the batsman from back of  length, the batsman fends it towards midwicket. That hit him on the handle of the bat
gets a touch squared up with this length delivery. Dhawan wanted to push it towards mid-on but ends up playing it to off
back of length and on the leg stump, Dhawan gets off the mark with a neat tuck behind square
probing line outside off, Rahane moves forward before leaving it alone
back of length delivery on the stumps, Rahane gets up on his toes and defends it down the pitch

first ball he has done it! Dhawan is reminded of England straightaway and it's yet another failure for him. This is beautifully bowled. It's on a length around off stump, bounces extra and just moves away a touch. Dhawan comes forward but can only edge it to the keeper
length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
he gets squared up with a fuller delivery on off, defends it down the pitch
he stays back and dabs the back of length delivery towards gully
completely beaten by this outswinger! This is a different class of bowling. It comes in in the air then shapes away late to square up Rayudu
he comes forward and defends the length delivery towards cover
bowls it full on the stumps but this is a half-volley, Rahane takes only a small step forward and punches it straight down past the non-striker
veers it full and on the pads, flicked away to deep backward square leg with ease
stays back and steers the length delivery to third man, gets off the mark
back of length and rising, the batsman fends it to the leg side, his bottom hand coming off the handle
leans forward and defends the length delivery towards mid-on
he dabs it to backward point to pick up a quick single and retain strike
fuller delivery on the stumps, this one keeps coming in and rolls to the leg side after hitting the pads
attempts the short ball but this sails over the batsman, called a wide by the umpire
keeps it outside off, Rayudu covers the line of the stumps and leaves it alone
he comes forward to defend the length delivery but is a touch surprised by the extra bounce
he goes wide of the crease and pushes it just outside off, Rayudu leaves it alone
he comes down the pitch and looks to drive, but he was not really confident as he played that, pushed to cover
beaten outside off as Rayudu goes for a cut but the ball bounces over the bat
another one past the outside edge! Rahane looks to drive on the up but the ball swings away from him
looks to drive and gets a thick outside edge through gully. It wasn't full at all and he was looking to play it on the up
looks to drive it from the crease but gets no timing as his bottom hand comes off the handle
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and punches it down the pitch
stays back and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
more extra bounce from Woakes. He is not bowling express, but is maintaining tight lines. Rayudu had to hop on the crease to defend
nice shape outside off, Rahane comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
charges down the pitch and looks to smash it through mid-on, but that has gone to second slip.. after hitting the pads
a little too straight this time from Anderson and it's tucked behind square. Those are the first runs off the bat against Anderson
first poor delivery from Anderson! This is wide outside off and Rahane throws his bat at that, driving it firmly in front of cover point
comes down the pitch to a back of length delivery and inside edges it to his pads
this is a bit premeditated from Rayudu. It's marginally short but Rayudu was looking to play the pull, he whacks it comfortably over midwicket for the first boundary of the morning
greets the bowler with a lofted shot over mid-off! He didn't try to hit that too hard
fuller on the stumps, the batsman punches it to mid-on
chases a full and wide delivery without getting close, gets a thick inside edge to fine leg
it's a fuller length delivery but Rahane plays it awkwardly from the back foot
comes forward to a fuller delivery and punches it through mid-off again. This was in the air for a long time.. it helped him that the fielder was a bit wide
comes forward and pushes this to mid-off
he charges down the pitch and looks to crash it over cover, but the extra bounce takes it past the outside edge
plants his front foot forward, opens his stance a bit, and looks to crash the length delivery through covers.. finds the fielder
superb bowling. Anderson is not giving much to the batsman. Keeps it around off and Rayudu can only defend
shuffles across to the off side and punches the fuller delivery firmly, straight to mid-on though
waits in the crease and looks to run it down to third man, but chops it straight to the third slip fielder
he moves to the off side and dabs it towards cover point for a quick single
he tucks it to backward square leg to pick up a single first ball
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to cover
he has finally found the timing! This is again premeditated but he has played that very well. A short arm jab and the ball sails over the cow corner. It was just a little short of length
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
outside edge! And this slips down through the cordon. He pushes forward at the fuller delivery without really coming forward, but there is only one slip in place
comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
back of length outside off, Rayudu is not in control as he steers it towards third man. It wasn't too far from Root at second slip
moves across to off well before the ball is bowled, Anderson smartly pushes it on leg stump. It's dabbed towards midwicket
he comes forward to defend and gets a touch squared up. Played to gully
short delivery outside off, Rahane plays a controlled pull to deep midwicket, rolling his wrists on it
back of length outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
comes down the pitch too early. Anderson digs it in short and Rayudu has to get out of the way
length delivery but this is a bit too straight, Rahane calmly tucks it through square leg and picks up a couple
back of length just outside off, the batsman arches back to create room and steers it to third man
he looks to pull the short delivery from outside off but is a bit hurried by the pace, dragged to mid-on
comes forward and punches this firmly, but hits it straight to mid-on
more premeditated stuff from the batsman. He moves across to off and drags a short ball to deep backward square leg
looks to punch the length delivery on the up but is beaten
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
too straight from Finn, the batsman clips it to fine leg for a single
back of length on the stumps, tucked to fine leg for another single
back of length delivery outside off, punched to deep cover without much timing
proper timing this time! Rayudu comes down the pitch and hits this off the meat of the bat, driven superbly through extra cover
moves inside the line of the delivery and clips it down to fine leg
he comes forward solidly and pushes the length delivery down the pitch
length delivery, defended to the off side
walks across to the off side, the bowler pushes it on the middle and leg line. Rayudu defends it to midwicket
he comes forward and punches the length delivery towards mid-off
he dabs it towards cover and calls early for a quick single
back of length delivery on off, Rayudu guides it to third man
length delivery on off stump line, defended towards point
moves down the crease and tries to create room, the bowler chases him with a leg-side line delivery, dabbed to gully

he has thrown it away! Poor shot from Rahane. Fifth time Rahane dismissed by Finn. He comes down the pitch and looks to whack the back of length delivery over midwicket but the extra bounce means it hits the splice of the bot and balloons towards mid-on where the fielder backpedals and takes an easy catch
comes forward and pushes the length delivery towards mid-on
stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to cover
back of length and rising outside off, steered to third man and Rayudu keeps strike
comes down the pitch and punches it straight to mid-off, he calls for a quick single and manages to get in
gets off the mark first ball with a tuck to midwicket
waits in the crease and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
this is short and very wide, Kohli chases it and cuts it over point without much timing.. That went off the toe of the bat
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
he shuffles across to the off side and tucks it through midwicket
back of length on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to off
he stays solidly behind the line of this, defends it down the pitch

he is gone! The extra bounce has done him here. He looks to dab the back of length delivery towards third man but this rises up and catches the shoulder of the bat... It flies high and Buttler takes a good catch behind the stumps. That is an action replay of Kohli's dismissal in the first innings of the Brisbane Test
he stays back expecting it to be short, but it isn't. It takes the outside edge and rolls through gully
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to backward square leg
gets a low full toss, pushes it back to the bowler

Moeen creates magic again! Raina steps out too early.. The bowler shortens the length, gets it to turn past the outside edge and Raina is stranded down the pitch.. He doesn't even make the effort to get back.
tossed up on the stumps, Dhoni pushes it to midwicket
flatter and shorter on the pads, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
he is getting some turn from this pitch, Dhoni defends it to midwicket again
tucks it behind square, playing it with the turn, picks up a single
he comes forward to this length delivery but is surprised by the extra bounce, his bottom hand comes off the handle as he clips it to fine leg
stays back and defends the back of length delivery to midwicket
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to off
back of length on off, defended to cover
takes the bottom hand out as he defends the rising delivery to off

Numero tres for Finn!! This is not too different from how Kohli got out.. back of length, rising outside off, Rayudu looks to guide it to third man but gets a thick edge to the keeper. It's that extra bounce again. Indian batsmen being swallowed at the Gabbatoir
tossed up outside off, the batsman defends it to midwicket
steps out and tucks the tossed up delivery through midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, Binny defends it to midwicket
he drives this tossed up delivery to midwicket
that almost went to the leg slip fielder! Binny was looking to clip but the turn means he gets an inside edge that was not too far from the fielder
he comes forward and defends it to midwicket
fuller on the stumps, Binny pushes it to midwicket with soft hands and calls for a quick single
he goes down on his knee and crashes the full and wide delivery through cover point. Opens the face and uses a lot of bottom hand as he plays that
fuller on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to midwicket without coming forward
hops on the crease and dabs the back of length delivery to the leg side and calls for a quick one
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to off
back of length but too straight, tucked away to square leg for a single
flatter and turning in, hits the pads as the batsman misses the tuck-shot
tossed up on off, the batsman drives it to long on
flatter on the stumps, Dhoni goes back and punches it down to long on
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman pushes it through mid-on
uses his feet and pushes it to long on
tossed up wide outside off, Dhoni pushes it through cover for a single
back of length on off, Dhoni punches it to the left of Broad. The bowler gets a hand but parries it away to the leg side and Dhoni is quick to steal a single
length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to point
keeps it tight around off, the batsman defends it solidly down the pitch
back of length on off, the batsman defends it to cover
floats it up, the batsman comes solidly behind the line and defends to cover
back of length on the stumps, clipped straight to square leg
flighted outside off, the batsman leans forward and pushes it down the pitch
tossed up on off, the batsman punches it to long on
he drags this flighted delivery down to fine leg with a punchy sweep
he comes forward and drives it to mid-off
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
wider outside off, nicely tossed up, Dhoni pushes it to cover for a quick single
that was close to the outside edge! Dhoni looks to drive the fuller delivery but plays inside the line. It straightened just a touch
waits on the back foot and punches it to cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
picks the gap expertly. He waits on the back foot and uses a lot of bottom hand as he punches it through cover point
he looks to come forward but has to duck as Broad digs this one short
he leans forward and punches this straight past the non-striker, starts running once the ball beats the mid-on fielder
tossed up wide outside off, the batsman plays it to midwicket with the turn
goes deep in the crease and punches the turning delivery to long on
tossed up outside off, the batsman pushes it to mid-on
he takes a step down the pitch and defends it down the pitch
comes out of the crease and eases the tossed up delivery to long on
he comes forward and defends it down the pitch
he leans forward to the fuller delivery and dabs it through gully for a single
he hops on the crease and tucks the back of length delivery to square leg
waits on the back foot and punches the length delivery firmly to mid-off
looks to pull the shorter delivery but it gets a bit big on him, he gets a bottom edge on the leg side
he shuffles across and gets solidly behind the line, defends it down the pitch
shorter delivery, the batsman pulls it down to fine leg for a single
shortish, spinning in and bouncing, punched to midwicket
fuller, he is forward to turn it to midwicket's right but won' t get the single
coming in to middle and leg, nudged to backward short leg
took a step outside then stopped and punched a flat one straight back to the bowler
worked to square leg with the spin
ending around off stump, he goes back to force it to long on
back of a length, jabbed in front of square on off, they take the single off the ricochet after there is a direct hit at the non-striker's
Binny goes straight and over, this was pitched up and he comes outside the crease to lift it cleanly
would have been straight to first slip, but there is no one there barring the keeper and Binny is able to pick up four off this fend even as he hops to a short of a length ball
now he goes for a hook to a leg sidish bouner, and the top edge flies fine, productive edging from Binny this over
gives him another short ball and this time Binny ducks
short of a length, he rides the bounce to guide it to point
pushed through on the stumps, defended down the pitch
much slower this time, Dhoni pushes it to midwicket off the back foot
he leans forward and tucks it past midwicket for a single
pushes it wide outside off but it turns in sharply and cramps the batsman for room as he looks to cut, hit straight to the fielder at point
tossed up outside off, the batsman steps out and eases it to long on
flighted delivery outside off, Dhoni picks up a single to long on
length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover off the back foot
back of length delivery outside off, defended to point
stays back and defends the rising delivery to the off side
too straight from Woakes, Dhoni clips it off his pads but the fielder at backward square leg cuts it off
stays back and tucks the back of length delivery to fine leg
shuffles across and clips the back of length delivery through square leg
pulls out the big shot, he steps out and lofts it over midwicket and picks up a couple. That brings the 50 of this partnership
steps out again but dabs it to square leg this time
waits on the back foot and defends it down the pitch
comes forward and flicks it through square leg, charges in for the second
tossed up outside off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
loud appeal for caught behind as Dhoni misses his intended cut shot. No reaction from the umpire
another appeal for caught behind! But the umpire says no. Binny charged down the pitch and was looking to play it through off, but makes no connection. Nothing on Hot Spot
back of length on the leg stump line, clipped away to fine leg
back of length delivery on off, Dhoni pulls it and pulls it well, along the ground to deep backward square leg
fuller on the stumps, the batsman whips it through midwicket
fuller delivery on the pads, flicked down to fine leg
back of length delivery on the stumps, defended down the pitch
stays back and tucks the turning delivery to backward square leg
flatter delivery on off, punched to long on
he waits on the back foot and pushes it to cover
tossed up on the stumps, Dhoni leans forward and clips it fine on the leg side
clean hit! Superb use of the feet and Binny then smashes it straight over the bowler's head.. into the crowd
he comes down the pitch and pushes it towards mid-on and it's drinks
stays in the crease and pushes the length delivery to point
walks across the stumps and nudges the back of length delivery to square leg
stays rooted to the crease as he attempts a push to cover, the ball moves just a touch to beat the outside edge
walks inside the line of the ball and tucks it in front of square leg for a quick single
back of length on the stumps, defended to point
cuts the length ball with a lot of timing, but finds the man at point

and he almost picks up a wicket! But he can only blame himself as he drops this easy return chance.. It was driven gently towards him but he just couldn't grab it. Maybe it came slower than expected. He stuck his left hand out, but he could have got both his hands to it
length delivery on off, defended to cover
waits on the back foot and cuts it firmly to point
back of length on the stumps, the batsman defends it to cover
he waits on the back foot and tucks it to midwicket
strays on to the pads, the batsman nudges it behind square on the leg side
gets his man! Finn has four now. Dhoni couldn't add on after that chance. It's a slower bounce on the leg stump line, Dhoni goes for the hook but feathers it to the keeper

he has got his five-for! Excellent bowling from round the stump. This one is fuller and comes in a touch to beat the inside edge.. goes through the gap and hits the top of off. Happy birthday Axar. It's his second golden duck in two games
not quite the ball you want to bowl at this moment.. it's wide outside off, easily left alone by the batsman. Finn smiles
fuller on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the off side
crashed off the back foot, in the air and in the gap at cover, they run hard and complete three
he comes forward and defends the length delivery.. But it's a no-ball.. Finn can't complain because he invented this one..the Finn no-ball
stays back and defends the back of length delivery down the pitch
fuller and on the stumps, Bhuvi leans into it and punches it past the bowler for a couple
now Anderson gets his second! This is full and straight and heading towards the off stump. Bhuvi just plays down the wrong line and it hits the top of off. India unravelling fast.
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
fuller on the stumps, the batsman pushes it down the pitch
he looks to play and upper cut on this slower bouncer but makes no connection
fuller on the stumps, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
whoa Binny! What timing there! He steps out and whacks this length ball over long on.. that's deep in the stands
gives himself some room but this is a slower bouncer outside off, Binny chases it but makes no connection
back of length delivery outside off, Binny plays the upper cut but it lands just short of third man
stays back and defends the back of length delivery to the off
back of length delivery outside off, steered to third man
loud appeal for a catch down the leg side! Binny went for the pull but misses
another appeal for caught behind! This time the batsman goes for the pull, misses, it hits the badge on the helmet and lobs up for the keeper
back of length delivery on the stumps, pushed to the leg side
superb catch by El Capitano! Binny looks to chip it over mid-off but gets more height than distance.. Morgan runs back, keeps his eyes firmly on the ball and takes a tumbling catch

this has been smoked! But what a fantastic catch by Moeen at cow corner! Shami whacked it with a lot of timing.. all eyes were aimed at the stands to see where it was landing, but no one saw Moeen setting himself up near the boundary.. he keeps his calm, avoids the rope and gobbles it up

inn2.comm: oversteps first ball! Bell has tucked it to square leg and taken a single, so Moeen gets to take the free hit
he makes room and slices the length delivery over point, doesn't get too much behind it, but enough for a couple
gets some inward shape, Moeen stays back and defends it down the pitch
stays in the crease and punches the length delivery towards cover
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
length delivery on off, calmly pushed towards off
keeps it tight on off, Moeen is in no hurry, pushes it to mid-off
now Bhuvi starts off with a wide, this is down the leg side
Bell gets off the mark with a beautifully timed push through cover point. It's on a length, Bell waits for it and just steers it through the gap. Excellent
strays on to the pads, the batsman whips it to fine leg
on the pads and no swing for Bhuvneshwar, 125 kph, tucked away to square leg for an easy single
length delivery on off, not much pace and no movement either, defended to cover with ease
some inward movement this time, Moeen is rock solid behind it and defends it down the pitch
Whack! This is only a bit short of length and Moeen thumps it over midwicket with a wristy whip. England off to a confident start
fuller delivery on the stumps, Bell is not going to miss out on those, he drives this beautifully past the bowler. It was in the air for a bit, but it travelled quickly
length ball outside off, 129 kph, Bell leaves it alone
leans into the fuller delivery and chips it over extra cover. Not much timing there, but it  is comfortably over the infield
crisp timing this time! He waits on this length delivery and opens the face of the bat to punch it through cover point
nice and tight around off stump, easily defended to the off side by Moeen
beaten by the slower delivery! Binny floats it up at 119 kph, Moeen took the invitation but didn't see the lack of pace, he ends up chipping it to mid-off, off the toe-end of the bat
Bell is stuck on the crease as he pushes at this full delivery, it swings just a touch to beat the outside edge
length delivery on the pads, nudged away to deep square leg with ease
full and shaping away outside off, 141 kph, Bell watches it carefully and lets it go through
looks to pull but doesn't get hold of it, it rolls in the gap at midwicket
length delivery on the stumps, tucked away behind square for a single
length delivery on off, he stays back and defends it down the pitch
fuller and swinging outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
too full and on the pads, neatly whipped away to fine leg
he stays back and defends the back of length delivery to point
he comes forward this time and pushes the length delivery towards cover
waits in the crease and allows the ball to come in, defends it towards cover
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman leave it alone this time
fuller and on off stump, 141 kph, Bell times it back at the bowler, who gets down in time to stop that from running away
back of length on the stumps, Bell pushes it towards mid-on
beautifully flicked! This is full and on the pads, Bell whips it over square leg, making no effort to keep it down.. It rolls on to the boundary after a couple of bounces
now he waits in the crease and punches it through cover point for three more
he gets off the mark with a well-timed drive through extra cover! It's full on off at 145 kph, but all Taylor needs to do is push it in the gap
length delivery outside off, 146 kph, left alone
length delivery on the pads, the batsman defends it to midwicket
waits on the back foot and steers it towards third man for an easy single
gets some shape on this length delivery, Bell waits on the back foot and defends it down the pitch
goes wide of the crease and pushes it full on off, but Bell leans on to it and drives it beautifully through off. It teases Kohli all the way to the boundary and just rolls over at the last moment
doesn't really take a big forward stride but times it supremely, straight to mid-off though
waits on the back foot and dabs it for a quick single to the right of Raina at second slip. Raina fires a throw, but with  the midwicket fielder outside the circle, that's an extra run
fuller and on the stumps, 128 kph, punched to mid-on with a straight bat
short outside off, the batsman waits and pulls it through midwicket for a couple
length delivery on off, he looks to drive it through cover, but ends up pushing it through cover point as the bat rotates in his hand
waits on the back foot and defends the length delivery to off
some width provided and Taylor cuts it firmly on to the square, the ball bounces over the leaping point fielder and they pick another couple
crashed hard but Rahane dives to his left quickly and cuts off a certain boundary
length ball with some shape, Bell waits for it and defends it towards point
comes forward and punches the length delivery straight to cover
this one comes in a touch, but Bell defends it easily from the crease
lots of width on this and Bell cashes on it, he caresses it through cover point with a flowing square drive
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman whips it through midwicket for a single
length delivery outside off, Taylor leaves it alone, then practices the punch he could have played
length delivery on off, stays a touch low as Bell defends it from the crease
he waits on the back foot and dabs the length delivery towards mid-on for a quick single
back of length outside off, 138 kph, chopped towards cover point
fuller on the middle stump line, Taylor pushes it to mid-on
marginally short of length and Taylor was almost waiting for it.. he is quickly into the position and slaps it through square leg for a boundary
drives it down the ground this time! Bhuvneshwar slides in from mid-on, but the ball ricochets off his body and rolls towards long-off
length delivery on off, 131 kph, defended off the back foot with ease
back of length on off, Taylor chops it towards gully
he goes wide of the crease and floats it up on off stump, Taylor comes forward and pushes it to cover point
fuller length on off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-off for a quick single. Kohli , who is back in the fielder, hits the stumps direct and the umpire too. The batsman was well in by that time
back of length on off, the batsman defends it to off
fuller on the stumps, the batsman drives it firmly to mid-off
fuller and on off, Taylor drives it easily to long off
slower and tossed up, Bell leans forward and pushes it to mid-on
goes down on his knee early and paddles it fine for another easy single
flatter and on the stumps, punched towards cover where the fielder makes a diving save
leans into the drive but hits it straight to cover
he waits on the back foot and defends this length delivery to the off
short ball without any pace on it, Bell has to wait a bit before pulling it down to fine leg
stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery to off
hangs back in the crease and steers the length delivery down to third man
creamed past the bowler but a dive from Kohli at mid-off prevents this from running to the boundary. They take a single nonetheless
poor delivery! This is down the leg side and it's lapped to fine leg with ease. Free runs those
length delivery outside off, left alone with ease
he drives the flighted delivery to mid-off
a repeat of the previous delivery, driven straight to mid-off again
takes a step down the crease before dabbing it to cover
short and wide, Bell waits on the back foot and chops it to deep cover
fuller delivery on the stumps, punched back down the pitch
bowls the arm ball and hits the pads, but that was drifting down leg
fuller on the stumps, the batsman clips it straight to midwicket
back of length on off, easily dabbed to backward point for a single
goes for the pull but he is not entirely in control, it takes the top edge and lands short of fine leg
Bell goes for the pull but this one is a touch quicker, 143 kph, and hits the batsman on the shoulder
slower delivery outside off, Bell spots it and keeps his bat away from the line
nicely timed through covers for a single to sweeper
fuller on off, Bell leans into the drive and pushes it to long off.. three short of a fifty now
a push through mid-off brings a quick single for Taylor
short and wide, Bell went for the cut but misses out as he finds the man at point
eases the flighted delivery to long off for another single
waits on the back foot and defends it from the crease
another single at long-off, plenty of easy singles available in that direction
shortish delivery, Taylor is in the position to play the pull but that comes a touch quicker at him, he manages to lob it over the infield safely though
driven with a lot of timing, but that's straight to the man at short cover
on the leg stump, this is tickled fine on the leg side and Bell reaches his 32nd ODI fifty. An effortless innings there for Bell
short ball outside off, the batsman sways out of line
waits on the back foot and steers it through gully
that's a firm drive! He doesn't look to keep it down, punches the fuller delivery straight past Taylor for three more
he waits on the back foot and chops the flatter delivery to point
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
clears his front leg and drives it beautifully through covers, but there is protection in the deep
quicker on the stumps, Taylor defends it down the pitch
flatter on the stumps, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
goes back and cuts the length delivery to backward point
fires it on the block hole, the batsman digs it out towards mid-on
driven firmly through extra cover! He gets low and punches it expertly in the gap
waits in the crease and dabs it towards backward point where a misfield allows a single. That brings up the 100 for England..
short ball and down the leg side, Bell pulls it down to fine leg comfortably
back of length outside off, 142 kph, Taylor defends it from the crease
goes for the pull on this bouncer, but this is quick and it flies past the helmet through to the keeper
he moves forward and chips it inside out for a couple to wide long-off, always in control of that shot
rasping pull now as the bowler pitches it short! Bell is not holding back, whacks it over midwicket and through to the boundary
cuts it late but can't beat the man at point
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery solidly to cover
he has been looking for that gap behind point and he finds it this time, cuts it late and beats the man at backward point, it runs away quickly
another powerful cut, this time the fielder at backward point dives and saves some runs
fuller and way down the leg side, the batsman goes for a paddle and gets the toe of his bat on it, picks up a couple down to fine leg
full and wide outside off, Taylor goes on the other side, drives it through extra cover for a couple
another drive, but this one is punched straight to the sweeper on the off side
beautifully punched through extra cover! Bell leans into the length delivery, hitting it on the up through the gap
he waits on the back foot and chops it down to the left of third man for a quick couple
short delivery outside off, Taylor pulls it firmly but Axar, who is standing just outside the circle, dives forward to get under it.. it just lands short of him
tossed up on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it to long off
he leans forward and punches the length ball easily to deep cover
waits for the length delivery and opens the face at the last moment, runs it down expertly past slip and picks up yet another boundary. That's the 100 of the partnership too
waits on the back foot and defends it towards point
flatter and shorter, he goes for the pull but gets a bit of bottom edge, played to midwicket
looks to play that late cut again, but Raina, at slip, dives to his right to cut it off
bowls the slower bouncer, Taylor is in position early and pulls it down to deep backward square leg
length delivery on the stumps, punched to mid-off
another slower bouncer, but this one gets a bit too high, Bell watches it go through
fuller on the stumps, he caresses it through extra cover with a lot of timing, a mere push
back of length on the stumps, nudges away to square leg for an easy single
fuller on the stumps, punched straight to mid-on
fuller and slower on off, Bell watches it carefully and pushes it through cover with soft hands
flatter and on the stumps, punched to long on off the back foot
steps out of the crease and nudges the flighted delivery away to deep midwicket
full and flighted on the stumps, defended down the pitch
goes back and dabs the length delivery towards short third man for a quick single
stays back and punches the flatter delivery towards long on
width provided and Bell is not going to miss out! He cuts it firmly through point and only a dive from Umesh Yadav prevents it from touching the rope
looks to short-arm jab this length delivery but misses out, it flies past the outside edge. The length was not short enough for the shot
gets a touch squared up as he dabs this length delivery towards backward point
stands tall and times the length delivery crisply through point, picks up two more to the deep
this was in the air for a bit, but it was in the gap between backward point and short third man, Bell slashed at the length delivery, picks up a single to third man
rolls his wrists on the pull shot as he drags it from outside off to deep midwicket
waits in the crease and chops the back of length delivery to point
steps out but drives it straight to midwicket
gets an inside edge through square leg and that brings up Taylor's third ODI fifty. A neat effort from the batsman
chopped straight to backward point
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to cover
punches it crisply but straight to extra cover
pushed down the leg side, easy call for the umpire to call this a wide
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to off
full outside off, easily dug out to deep cover for a single
waits for the short one and pulls it in front of square for a single
slower bouncer, Taylor spots it and sways out of line
another bouncer, this one is well controlled down to fine leg
waits on the back foot and punches it with ease to deep cover
length delivery on off, punched firmly to mid-on
he went for the cut but almost chopped it on.. it was close to the off stump
tossed up on the stumps, punched to long on for a single
goes down on his knee early and paddles it fine to complete a thoroughly convincing win
